steps.name: Introduction
steps.content: Compound Finance is a decentralized lending and borrowing platform based on the Ethereum blockchain.

steps.name: Mechanism
steps.content: Users can deposit assets into markets and borrow base assets according to their needs and preferences.

steps.name: Example
steps.content: For instance, users can deposit WBTC as collateral and borrow USDC, with flexibility in repayment to avoid liquidation risks.

steps.name: Interest Rates
steps.content: Based on the utilization ratio of the base asset, interest rates are determined.

steps.name: On-Chain Record
steps.content: All borrowing and lending activities are recorded on-chain. Users also have the flexibility to update their positions at any time.

steps.name: Governance by COMP Holders
steps.content: COMP token holders have full control over Compound's management marking a shift towards decentralized governance.
